tossup_question: 18) MATH  The shadow of a tree is sqrt(3) times its height. If John Smith is sitting at the end of the shadow, at what angle to the ground must he tilt his head to look at the top of the tree?
bonus_question: 18) MATH  A cuboctahedron is a polyhedron with 14 faces and 24 edges. How many vertices does it have?
